newsitem.title: UK: UK MACHINE TOOL TURNOVER DOWN 1.6% 3MTHS TO JUNE.
newsitem.headline: UK MACHINE TOOL TURNOVER DOWN 1.6% 3MTHS TO JUNE.

text.p: Turnover of machine tools in Britain fell by a seasonally adjusted 1.6 percent in the three months to June versus the previous quarter, the Office for National Statistics said on Wednesday.
This was due to a 13.5 percent fall in export turnover which more than outweighed a 6.5 percent increase in home turnover.
Turnover rose by 3.1 percent compared with the same period a year ago.
Total orders on hand for machine tools were 9.5 percent lower at the end of June than at the end of March, and were 19.1 percent down on June last year.
